profileAlternative.name: Sarah Branfman
profileAlternative.headline: Ensuring Success with MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
I work tirelessly to develop true understandings of MongoDB users to deliver appropriate solutions that will enhance their ability to succeed.

Strengths: Drive revenue. Build winning teams. Work and close strategic deals while delivering a volume of transactions that fuel the business.

Specialties: Open Source, Sales Effectiveness, Customer Retention, Database Technologies, Software as a Service (SaaS), Cloud Computing, Enterprise Software, Leadership, New Account Development, Complex Solution Selling

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
MongoDB is the leading modern, general purpose database platform, designed to unleash the power of software and data for developers and the applications they build. With 5,700 customers in over 90 countries, The MongoDB database platform has been downloaded over 35 million times.

Rebuilding ISV program.

+ Designed and launched comprehensive program to ensure our partners and our joint end-customers succeed.
+ Drove 600% sourced business growth y/y in first 3 quarters
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Senior Director, Worldwide Sales Development
positions.description:
Re-Built MongoDB’s Sales Development program.

+ Increased Sales Dev productivity by 71% for inbound reps & 267% for outbound reps
+ Built and documented Progression Path and Promoted 15 individuals
+ Built Recruiting Playbook to optimize for hiring, launched first Sales Intern program at MongoDB.
+ Recruited, Hired and Onboarded 35 Reps and 4 Leaders across North America, EMEA and APAC
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Director, West Sales
positions.description:
Built and led teams of 8-10 Account Executives responsible for driving net new business.

Professional Highlights:
+ My Account Execs top the global leader board, quarter over quarter
+ Worldwide Top Performing Team -- Generated highest revenues
+ Drove half the revenue of MongoDB's Global Mid-Market segment
+ FY16 (2015-2016) : 126% of Software Quota. 277% of Services Quota
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Head of Sales, Cloud Services
positions.description:
Built and led the team responsible for driving worldwide adoption and revenue of MongoDB’s Cloud Services. I spearheaded feature and product enhancements, working alongside Product and Engineering to understand customer pain, market potential and appropriate solution.

Professional Highlights
+ Grew customer base by 700%
+ Grew revenue by 630%

Additionally, from content creation to delivery, I built a worldwide training and enablement program.
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Senior Enterprise Account Executive
positions.description:
In addition to helping build MongoDB, Inc.'s sales organization from 5 people, I focused on understanding our users’ specific needs from both a technical and business perspective to devise a plan and deliver the appropriate solutions to reduce risk and accelerate time to value. When solutions were not available, I worked with Product and Engineering to create them.

Professional Highlights:
+ MongoDB Outstanding Contributor Award
+ Worldwide Sales Top Performer -- Generated Highest Revenues
+ Drove highest number of net new logos (10 Fortune 500, 100+ overall)
+ Grew business by over 700%
+ Worked across industries including: Media, Financial Services, Healthcare, Telecommunications, Web / Tech , Government and Retail
+ FY14 (2013-2014): 245% of Quota
+ FY13 (2012-2013) : 143% of Quota
…
see more

positions.title: Sales Director, Media & Start-Up Verticals
positions.description: I built Bluewolf’s Start-Up vertical from ground-up. Within a few months, I took ownership of our Media Vertical as well. I grew these verticals by record amounts, generating the highest revenues of the company year over year.

positions.title: Associate Producer
positions.companyName: NBC Nightly News with Brian Williams

given.text:
Sarah is a phenomenal sales executive and a powerful force to work with. I had the pleasure of working with her for five years as her career skyrocketed from one of MongoDB's best sales reps to running the global SDR organization. She was always an ideal partner and ensured that marketing and sales were truly aligned with each other towards success. Sarah is a pleasure to work with, livens up any office and cares passionately for everyone around her.
…
See more

Sarah is one of the most intuitive creative thinkers I have met. From her days at NYU to now she has continuously challenged herself with a career path that others would have easily failed at and yet she always rises to the top as the best at what she does. That is just her nature as she sets goals and makes things happen. Failure is not an option for Sarah and I highly recommend her!
…
See more

Sarah is among the most competent leaders I've ever had the privilege of working with. It's the perfect pairing of her ability to quickly connect with others, and her complete vision of the big picture which makes her so uniquely able to inspire action from all parties involved allowing them to benefit from the value they add. This played out both in the development of her reps as well as the relationships built with our customers. It is in Sarah's nature to exceed ambitious goals, and to empower those around her to do the same. I am excited to see what the future holds for Sarah, and for those who are lucky enough to work with her!
…
See more

Working alongside Sarah was an absolute pleasure. She is motivating, positive, highly intelligent, supportive and a complete team player. I was constantly impressed by the quality of her relationships, her attentiveness to her clients, and her ability to remain consultative within a highly transactional business. She would be an amazing asset to any organization.
…
See more

Sarah is the ideal sales professional. She get's it right 100% of the time. The combination of fanatical customer service, a flawless work-ethic and a 'never-say-die' attitude means she never misses a goal, and never disappoints. Sarah is a delight to have on your team. She has a smile on her face, and a helpful and infectiously positive manner, no-matter what challenges occur. I'm not sure I know a better technology rep in the USA.
…
See more

At the risk of being redundant, let me add my comments to what many already know - Sarah is an effective, high-energy professional with a focus on results. Whenever I have engaged her services she has been motivated and results oriented, garnering great outcomes for everyone involved.

Sarah is a bright and hardworking individual. I have found her passion and professionalism with the work she does to be refreshing. She goes out of her way to fully understand her customer's needs, and then does whatever she can to make sure those needs are met. It has been a pleasure doing business with her, and I look forward to the opportunity to do so again.
…
See more

received.text: No task is too big or too small, from getting volunteers to donate their time and energy at events to logistics planning for how best to organize or drive attendance.   Oliver's can-do attitude, extensive network and big thinking made him and Breaking the Glass a great partner to Power Heels!

Meg's breadth of knowledge, data-driven approach and execution-focused attitude make her an incredible and highly effective partner to Sales. With expertise in marketing automation and demand gen and the ability to understand and align programs to rapidly changing business needs (evolving requirements are a given at a company that expanded from a dozen employees to 750+, as MongoDB did with Meg onboard) she is an asset to organizations of all sizes.
